skills.name: PROMOTE
desc: • Deals random damage to all enemies.
• Grants Immunity for 1 turn to allies with no beneficial effects active.
• Damage dealt increases based on your SPECIAL stat and the enemy’s ATK and MAGIC.

skills.name: SUPPORT
desc: • Heal all allies based on their MAX HP.
• 35% Chance to Extend Beneficial Effects of allies for 1 turn.

skills.name: IMMUNIZE
desc: Grants Perfect Immunity to self for the duration of the battle and up to 2 random allies for 1 turn. Perfect Immunity blocks all harmful effects and prevents beneficial effects from being removed.
